item.title: LsAP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LsAP2 Gene Name: APETALA2 Genome: Species: Lactuca sativa Functional Descriptions: The lettuce APETALA2 (LsAP2) gene regulates leaf morphology.

item.title: PhERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhERS1 Gene Name: ethylene receptor1 Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Characterization of two ethylene receptors PhERS1 and PhETR2 from petunia: PhETR2 regulates timing of anther dehiscence.

item.title: ZjTCP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ZjTCP2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Ziziphus jujuba Functional Descriptions: The ‘Candidatus Phytoplasma ziziphi’ effectors SJP1/2 negatively control leaf size by stabilizing the transcription factor ZjTCP2 in jujube.
